Title: We also have a pair of hands, we do not need to eat the spare food in the cities!
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Sichuan Art Academy (四川美术学院革命委员会供稿)
Notes: The slogans on the wall read "Selfreliance" (ziligengsheng, 自力更生) and "Diligently building the country" (qinjian jianguo, 勤俭建国). The text on the banner reads "Welcome to the countryside" (huansong dao nongcun an jia, 欢送到农村安家).
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
